Properties.string: Clone a tool from your backpack.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer
rate=1/30 debris=game:GetService("Debris") canclone=true
function waitfor(parent,name) while parent:FindFirstChild(name)==nil do wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
moveint=22 scrollspeed=.1
function creategui() tool=nil if plr:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui")~=nil and plr:FindFirstChild("Backpack")~=nil then if gui~=nil then gui:remove() end gui=Instance.new("ScreenGui") gui.Name="ToolCloneGui" gui.Parent=plr.PlayerGui
showframe=Instance.new("Frame") showframe.Style="RobloxRound" showframe.Position = UDim2.new(1,-480,1,-410) showframe.Size = UDim2.new(0,160,0,200) showframe.ClipsDescendants=true showframe.Visible=false showframe.Parent = gui
showimage=Instance.new("ImageLabel") showimage.Size=UDim2.new(1,0,0,150) showimage.BackgroundTransparency=1 showimage.Parent=showframe
closebutton=Instance.new("TextButton") closebutton.Text="X" closebutton.TextScaled=true closebutton.Style="RobloxButtonDefault" closebutton.Size=UDim2.new(0,30,0,30) closebutton.TextColor3=Color3.new(1,0,0) closebutton.Font="Arial" closebutton.FontSize="Size14" closebutton.Position=UDim2.new(1,-20,0,-10) closebutton.Parent=showframe closebutton.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() showframe.Visible=false end)
clonebutton=Instance.new("TextButton") clonebutton.Text="Clone" clonebutton.Style="RobloxButton" clonebutton.Size=UDim2.new(0,80,0,30) clonebutton.TextColor3=Color3.new(1,1,1) clonebutton.Font="ArialBold" clonebutton.FontSize="Size14" clonebutton.Position=UDim2.new(.5,-40,1,-35) clonebutton.Parent=showframe clonebutton.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() local chr=plr.Character if tool~=nil and chr~=nil then local ctool=tool:clone() --ctool.CanBeDropped=true local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") local hndl=ctool:FindFirstChild("Handle") if hndl~=nil and t~=nil and canclone then canclone=false gui:remove() hndl.CFrame=t.CFrame+(t.CFrame.lookVector*10)+Vector3.new(0,5,0) ctool.Parent=game.Workspace local s=Instance.new("Sound") s.Name="PhaseInSoundEffect" s.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=97272128" debris:AddItem(s,5) s.Parent=hndl delay(.05,function() if s~=nil then s:Play() end end) delay(0,function() p=Instance.new("Part") p.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Cyan") p.FormFactor="Custom" p.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) p.Anchored=true p.CanCollide=false p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.Name="Effect" local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshType="Sphere" m.Parent=p debris:AddItem(p,5) p.CFrame=hndl.CFrame+Vector3.new(0,-3,0) p.Parent=game.Workspace frames=.5/rate for frame=1,frames do local percent=frame/frames m.Scale=Vector3.new(5,5,5)*(1-percent)*8 p.Transparency=percent wait(rate) end sp:remove() end) wait(2) sp:remove() end end end)
frame=Instance.new("Frame") frame.Style="RobloxRound" frame.Position = UDim2.new(1,-300,1,-410) frame.Size = UDim2.new(0,200,0,323) frame.ClipsDescendants=true frame.Parent = gui
window=Instance.new("Frame") window.BackgroundTransparency=1 window.ClipsDescendants=true window.Parent=frame
scroller=Instance.new("Frame") scroller.BackgroundTransparency=.5 scroller.BorderSizePixel=0 scroller.Position = UDim2.new(1,-25,0,0) scroller.Size = UDim2.new(0,25,1,0) scroller.Parent = frame
local buttonup=Instance.new("ImageButton") buttonup.Size=UDim2.new(0,25,0,25) buttonup.Position=UDim2.new(0,0,0,0) buttonup.Image="rbxasset://textures/ui/scrollbuttonUp.png" buttonup.BackgroundTransparency=1 buttonup.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() upbuttondown=true while upbuttondown do if window.Position.Y.Offset+moveint>=0 then window.Position=UDim2.new(0,0,0,0) upbuttondown=false else window.Position=window.Position+UDim2.new(0,0,0,moveint) end wait(scrollspeed) end end) buttonup.MouseButton1Up:connect(function() upbuttondown=false end) buttonup.MouseLeave:connect(function() upbuttondown=false end) buttonup.Parent=scroller
local buttondown=Instance.new("ImageButton") buttondown.Size=UDim2.new(0,25,0,25) buttondown.Position=UDim2.new(0,0,1,-25) buttondown.BackgroundTransparency=1 buttondown.Image="rbxasset://textures/ui/scrollbuttonDown.png" buttondown.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() downbuttondown=true while downbuttondown do if (window.Position.Y.Offset+window.Size.Y.Offset)-moveint<=frame.Size.Y.Offset then window.Position=UDim2.new(0,0,0,frame.Size.Y.Offset-window.Size.Y.Offset) downbuttondown=false else window.Position=window.Position+UDim2.new(0,0,0,-moveint) end wait(scrollspeed) end end) buttondown.MouseButton1Up:connect(function() downbuttondown=false end) buttondown.MouseLeave:connect(function() downbuttondown=false end) buttondown.Parent=scroller
i=0 for _,v in ipairs(plr.Backpack:GetChildren()) do if v.className=="Tool" then local button=Instance.new("TextButton") button.Size=UDim2.new(1,0,0,20) button.Position=UDim2.new(0,0,0,i*22) button.TextColor3=Color3.new(1,1,1) button.Style="RobloxButton" button.Text=v.Name button.Visible=true button.Parent=window button.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() if v~=nil then tool=v showimage.Image=v.TextureId showframe.Visible=true end end) i=i+1 end end window.Size=UDim2.new(1,-30,0,(i+1)*22) end end
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if mouse~=nil and plr~=nil then creategui() end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false if gui~=nil then gui:remove() end end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
